underConstructions.title: Under constructions!

question_1.title: What kind of project is this?
question_1.answer: The project is a space where owners of bots (Telegram stores) can manage their bots, and Telegram users can view their products in Telegram

question_2.title: What roles are there in this project?
question_2.answer:
This project has the role of system administrator, administrator and user.
The system administrator creates administrators (owners of telegram bots).
Administrators manage their bots and products.
Users view bots on Telegram

question_3.title: Can I get my own bot?
question_3.answer: Yes, for this you need to send a request in telegram - https://t.me/script696://t.me/script696

question_4.title: How many active bots are there at the moment?
question_4.answer: At the moment there are two test bots xomi and alpha.

question_5.title: Is it possible to test the functionality of bots?
question_5.answer: Yes! You can try yourself as an administrator by logging in with the name xomi or alpha, password 1111

question_6.title: Is it possible to take part in the development?
question_6.answer: Yes, for this you need to send a request in telegram - https://t.me/script696://t.me/script696
